issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description: In an HA configuration, when the availability of a host with a database changes we should refresh any pooled connections so that the available hosts are used and connections to unavailable hosts are promptly closed.
fields.summary: Database connection pools should be refreshed on host activation or deactivation

comments.body: Regression testing of HA is sufficient to verify this issue.

Fix verified.

Installed Packages
Name        : eucalyptus
Arch        : x86_64
Version     : 3.4.0
Release     : 0.0.1439.20130829git482ab5e9.el6
